price: 16. Fircoon se wuu caasiyey Rasuulkii (loo diray Muuse c.s.), markaasaan qabannay qabasho daran.
arabic: فَعَصَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنُ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُ أَخۡذٗا وَبِيلٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: faʿaṣā fir'ʿawnu al-rasūla fa-akhadhnāhu akhdhan wabīlan
